results.title: Pilot Dies After Medical Emergency on Flight From Miami to Chile
results.abstract: The pilot, part of a three-member crew, died after the Latam Airlines flight made an emergency landing in Panama on Monday, the airline said.

media.caption: The plane, a Boeing 787, was forced to make a diversion to Panama because of the pilot’s “medical emergency,” Latam Airlines said in a statement on Thursday.

results.title: Trump Plans to Skip G.O.P. Debate for Interview With Tucker Carlson
results.abstract: The former president’s apparent decision to skip the first debate is a major affront both to the Republican National Committee and to Fox News, which is hosting the event.

media.caption: For weeks, Donald J. Trump has been quizzing aides, associates and rally crowds about whether he should participate in the debate. He has decided to be interviewed by Tucker Carlson instead, people briefed on the matter said.

results.title: Architect of Fake Electors Scheme Appeared to Be Outside Capitol on Jan. 6
